ygData.subject: Equipment Rehash...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I know we ve been over and over this, and I even saved some of the emails, but....as our IT department is having a crackdown and we are in the midst of a
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I know we've been over and over this, and I even saved some of the
emails, but....as our IT department is having a crackdown and we are in the
midst of a merger, they enforced our 40mb limit on mailbox sizes and yes, I
admit it, I trashed my store of eqbards mails ... bad me!

Anyway, what I would like to know is what you high level bards are wearing
and weilding .. the weapons/instruments you actually use up into the
mid-high 50s. I'd also like to know if you feel like it, where I can get
these items .. yes I can look them up but feeling lazy today!

As soon as Halana hits 59 (I've given up on 60), I'm going to start focusing
on BRD.

Currently, Tani has (forgive me for spelling mistakes):

-sionoche's partisan
-journeymans stick
-mistmoore drums (working on getting selos)
-lute from mistmoore
-dragonborne sash
-lizzie cloak
-those earrings from mistmoore
-fire opal rings
-fungi tunic
-kylong legs, bracers, hat
-ss boots, gloves
-tattered mantle
-forget the necklace

Let me know which items you all think I can improve on .. especially
weaponwise...if you want send me a private email so Im not spamming everyone
- this is already long!

Thanks, smooches, love you all :)

Halana, 58th Shammykins
Tani, 41st Bardette
Solusek Ro


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
